mapper.select: SELECT NOTICECODE, MANAGERCODE, CREATEDDATE, RN FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_CODE AS NOTICECODE, MANAGER_CODE AS MANAGERCODE , SUBJECT, TO_CHAR(CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATEDDATE , ROWNUM AS RN FROM NOTICE ORDER BY RN DESC ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM NOTICE
